headline: Citi Retains a Neutral Rating on Sysco Corporation (SYY)
summary: Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY) is among the 12 Best Food Stocks to Buy in 2026. According to TheFly, on January 7, 2026, Citi reduced its price target for Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY) from $82 to $81. It kept a neutral rating on the stock. The revision was part of Citi’s overall 2026 projection upgrade for the food […]
